review: Took my 4 year old son for a dental checkup. Had an amazing experience as there was no wait time and the clinic premise is extremely good. Dr. Saloni is very soft spoken and patiently handled my kid. She has good knowledge and doesn't advise any unnecessary treatment.

review: Visited to Dr Saloni with a tooth  ache, she did my RCT and crown with so much ease and passion that I am really impressed. Thanku you so much Doc. She also treated my wife and son with extreme care. I would really recommend her to anyone who is in need of oral care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently had the opportunity to receive dental care from Dr. Saloni Gupta, and I must say that my experience was exceptional. I had been suffering from dental pain and gum bleeding for quite some time, and I was quite apprehensive about visiting the dentist. However, from the moment I walked into Dr. Gupta's clinic, I felt at ease.
Dr. Saloni and their team were incredibly welcoming and reassuring. They took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly explained the treatment plan. The level of professionalism and expertise displayed by Dr.Saloni was truly commendable.

The dental procedure itself was virtually painless,  gentle and skilled approach. They made sure I was comfortable throughout the process, which significantly eased my anxiety.

Overall, I  thank Dr. Saloni Gupta and their team  for their outstanding care and expertise. They have not only addressed my dental concerns but also made me feel comfortable and well-informed throughout the entire process. I highly recommend Dr. Saloni to anyone in need of dental treatment
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Saloni for dental care, *** * **** *** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ***********. Her expertise, professionalism, and genuine care for her patients are truly exceptional. I highly recommend Dr. Saloni for anyone seeking top-notch dental care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My recent dental experience was exceptional. The dentist displayed impressive skill in scaling and cleaning my teeth. From the moment I arrived, the atmosphere was calming, and the staff was incredibly welcoming. The dentist's precision during the procedure was evident; they efficiently removed plaque and tartar while being gentle, ensuring minimal discomfort. The post-treatment results were remarkable; my teeth felt incredibly clean and noticeably brighter. This experience has elevated my confidence in dental care and left me with a healthier, fresher smile. I would highly recommend this dentist for their expertise in scaling and cleaning, making the visit comfortable and effective.
